title: PMS 2.0 624 - Sweet Sixteen Preview, Darius Butler, Shams Charania, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about tonight's Sweet Sixteen games and the exclusive Super Boost available only on FanDuel for all the games combined points to be more than 575, and continue to discuss how Tyreek Hill going to the Dolphins is still a shocker and what he's going to bring to the Dolphins' offense, plus the rumors that teams are starting to call on the availability of DK Metcalf and Tyler Lockett. Joining the program to talk about everything going on in the NFL and what teams need to do as we get closer and closer to the NFL Draft is 9 year NFL veteran at Defensive Back, host of the Man-To-Man Podcast, Everything DB, Darius Butler (44:14-1:05:53). Later, joining the show is friend of the progrum, NBA Insider for Stadium and The Athletic, Shams Charania to chat about whether or not Zion Williamson is going to play at all this season after posting a video on his Instagram of him throwing down a massive through the legs windmill dunk, the Yankees and Mets being the ones to thank for Kyrie Irving to start playing in Brooklyn, when Ben Simmons is expected to return, if the Lakers might actually miss the playoffs, and more (1:05:55-1:26:28). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show, and listen on Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
